sentences.en: All the reactionary rulers who hold the people down will inevitably meet their doom.
sentences.cn: 一切压迫人民的反动统治者总是要灭亡的.

sentences.en: In either case, it is both reactionary and Utopian.
sentences.cn: 它在这两种场合都是反动的,同时又是空想的.

sentences.en: It grew ever more clear to everyone that the Minister was too reactionary, too blinkered.
sentences.cn: 大家都越来越清楚部长太保守、心胸太狭窄。

sentences.en: It was useless to try to'stabilize the dying reactionary situation. "
sentences.cn: 试图稳定垂死的反动局面是徒劳的.

sentences.en: Nay more, they are reactionary, for they try to roll back the wheel of history.
sentences.cn: 不仅如此, 他们甚至是反动的, 因为他们力图使历史的车轮倒转.

sentences.en: Riddled with a thousand gaping wounds , this reactionary clique is now beset with difficulties and contradictions both in internal and external affairs.
sentences.cn: 今天, 这个反动集团百孔千疮,内外交困,矛盾重重.

sentences.en: Some of the labour leaders were also questioned by the reactionary police.
sentences.cn: 一些工会领导人也受到反动警察的查问.

sentences.en: The men are hidebound and reactionary.
The reactionary authorities are between two fires and have been discredited.
sentences.cn: 反动当局弄得进退维谷,不得人心.

sentences.en: The reactionary officer then ordered him arrested.
sentences.cn: 这时反动军官下令把他抓起来.

sentences.en: The reactionary rulers found it very difficult to bring the oppressed natives under.
sentences.cn: 反动统治者发现要征服那些被压迫的当地人是很困难的.

sentences.en: The reactionary ruling clique was torn by internal strife.
sentences.cn: 反动统治集团内部勾心斗角,四分五裂.

sentences.en: The reactionary troops are being hit everywhere.
sentences.cn: 反动派的军队到处挨打.

sentences.en: They forced thousands of peasants into their reactionary armies.
sentences.cn: 他们迫使成千上万的农民参加他们的反动军队.

sentences.en: This threw the reactionary police into utter panic.
sentences.cn: 这使反动警察极为惊恐.

words.tran_cn: 反应，感应；反动，复古；反作用
极端保守主义；反动思想

trans.tran_cn: 保守的，反动的；反动主义的；反对改革的
trans.tran_en: very strongly opposed to any social or political change - used to show disapproval

trans.tran_cn: 反动派，保守分子，保守派
trans.tran_en: someone who strongly opposes any social or political change - used to show disapproval
